message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us and is worth $12,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and unique features, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, I am willing to sell this product to you for $11,500. This is a special opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a price that represents a significant savings compared to its market value. I believe this offer presents an excellent balance between affordability and the true worth of the product. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
